subject: Re: AW: [junit] get Message "Could not invoke the suite() method" 	fr om JUnit Testrunner
msgSnippet: Wolfgang, First, I saw no code.  If you attached it as a file, it is probably being stripped.  You have two choices here, inline the code with the message or
messageBody:
Wolfgang,

First, I saw no code. If you attached it as a file, it is probably
being stripped. You have two choices here, inline the code with the
message or put it in the 'Files' section of this group and let us know
where it is.

Now on to the point of the message:

Curious. This is totally different behavior, as you can see. Here the
suite was invoked. I see nothing in the trace to lead me to a
conclusion though. However, about your classpath -- look in your
<jdk-install-directory>/lib/ext. Is there a crimson.jar, xerces.jar, or
xercesImpl.jar? If so, you will need to purge them. The JDK 1.3
automatically takes anything in the lib/ext directory and prepends it to
your classpath.

Also, I assume you are using SUN's JDK. Is that so?

One other note, if you compile with debugging information you will get
the line number in the stack trace.

=jason

On Wed, 2003-03-05 at 14:09, Weber, Wolfgang wrote: Hi Jason (and all
the others)!

I followed your suggestion to use the textuirunner instead of the
swinguirunner. Look what I got:

C:\>java -cp
JUnit.jar;xercesImpl.jar;xmlParserAPIs.jar;testtreiberNom.jar teste
xercise.Testtreiber
Es wurden 3 Testfaelle eingelesen!

.F
Time: 1,993
There was 1 failure:
1) test(testexercise.Testtreiber)
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError
at junit.framework.Assert.fail(Assert.java:32)
at junit.framework.Assert.assert(Assert.java:19)
at junit.framework.Assert.assert(Assert.java:26)
at testexercise.Testtreiber.aufruf(Testtreiber.java)
at testexercise.Testtreiber.test(Testtreiber.java)
at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
at junit.framework.TestCase.runTest(TestCase.java:156)
at junit.framework.TestCase.runBare(TestCase.java:130)
at junit.framework.TestResult$1.protect(TestResult.java:106)
at junit.framework.TestResult.runProtected(TestResult.java:124)
at junit.framework.TestResult.run(TestResult.java:109)
at junit.framework.TestCase.run(TestCase.java:121)
at junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:157)
at junit.framework.TestSuite.run(TestSuite.java:152)
at junit.textui.TestRunner.doRun(TestRunner.java:74)
at junit.textui.TestRunner.run(TestRunner.java:201)
at junit.textui.TestRunner.run(TestRunner.java:187)
at testexercise.Testtreiber.main(Testtreiber.java)

FAILURES!!!
Tests run: 1, Failures: 1, Errors: 0

This means that the classpath is right. What's wrong so far is the
number of runs, Junit reported: 1.

Using the code inside VAJ, there are 3 runs and that what the line "Es
wurden 3 Testfaelle eingelesen!" means: 3 testcases. But Junit stopped
after the first Assert.fail.

Somebody asked for the code. Here we are. I hope you can find the
problem. Thank you very much for your support.

Bye
